Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, west of Elaine's Bow shop.
Room.LongDescription: Elaine's Bow shop supplies archers and knights from the Lyanden Castle with superior quality crossbows and longbows for use in battle or defending the city. The high quality bows are more mechanical than natural, but nothing can really match an elven longbow.
